person_1.code: Wir enthält Sven. Sven mag Musik. Ich mag Musik. Wir enthält mich. Mich darstellen als Ich.  Ich will mich treffen um Musik zu machen.

1_Hello.svg: {{ text }}

10_horizontal_path.svg: <path d="M {{ M }} L {{ L }} " fill="none" stroke="rgb(0, 0, 0)" stroke-miterlimit="10" pointer-events="stroke"/>

10_wir.svg:
<defs>
            <linearGradient x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%" id="mx-gradient-f8d4b5-1-ea6b66-1-s-0">
                <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#f8d4b5;stop-opacity:1"/>
                <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#ea6b66;stop-opacity:1"/>
            </linearGradient>
        </defs><ellipse cx="350" cy="480" rx="300" ry="160" fill="url(#mx-gradient-f8d4b5-1-ea6b66-1-s-0)" pointer-events="all"/>

test_MI-29.html: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang='en'><head><meta charset='UTF-8'><title>Example Page</title><script>{{ js }}</script><style>{{ css }}</style></head>{{ body }}</html>
test_MI-29.main:
{{ text }}

Link to our conversation

For more details on the project, visit the Project Page.
test_MI-29.svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 80'><circle cx='50' cy='40' r='10' stroke='green' stroke-width='4' fill='yellow'>{{ fancy_modulation }}</circle></svg>
test_MI-29.fancy_modulation: <animate attributeName='cy' values='40;10;40;70;40' dur='5s' repeatCount='indefinite'/><animate attributeName='fill' values='yellow;red;yellow;green;yellow' dur='5s' repeatCount='indefinite'/>
test_MI-29.text: Hallo! This is a simple example of SVG and HTML integration.
test_MI-29.css: body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } header, footer { text-align: center; background-color: #f8f9fa; padding: 10px; } main { margin: 20px; text-align: center; } svg { margin-top: 20px; } a { color: blue; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } h2 { margin-top: 0; font-size: 1.2em; color: #333; }
